titles.title: A bill to authorize the development of public outdoor recreation areas and facilities at Minidoka Dam in the State of Idaho.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. Report No: 100-974.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

bill.summary: 9/26/1988--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct and maintain public outdoor recreation areas and facilities at Minidoka Dam, Idaho. Requires 50 percent of the costs for such construction and maintenance to be repaid to the Federal Government from non-Federal interests. Authorizes appropriations.
